trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is the tool that allows you to configure the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSESearchName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> interface. The use of the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is intended for administrators, so access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is controlled. All administrative users must have an administrative account to gain access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. You can create and modify administrative accounts.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="Default.Comment" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><is there a default admin account with default admin credentials?></MadCap:conditionalText> Administrative users can display the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in different languages that have been installed.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is the tool that allows you to configure the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSESearchName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> interface.

The use of the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is intended for administrators, so access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is controlled.
All administrative users must have an administrative account to gain access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

You can create and modify administrative accounts.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="Default.Comment" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><is there a default admin account with default admin credentials?></MadCap:conditionalText> Administrative users can display the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in different languages that have been installed.

target.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is the tool that allows you to configure the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSESearchName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> interface.

The use of the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is intended for administrators, so access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is controlled.
All administrative users must have an administrative account to gain access to the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

You can create and modify administrative accounts.<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="Default.Comment" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><is there a default admin account with default admin credentials?></MadCap:conditionalText> Administrative users can display the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in different languages that have been installed.

trans-unit.source: In the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you can customize which search profiles exist and how they are used, the themes which are applied to search profiles, library limits, and item display codes. You can also customize any connections to third-party enriched content providers.

seg-source.mrk: In the <MadCap:variable name="MyVariables.VSEAdminName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, you can customize which search profiles exist and how they are used, the themes which are applied to search profiles, library limits, and item display codes.
You can also customize any connections to third-party enriched content providers.

You can also customize any connections to third-party enriched content providers.
